title: Department and Title of Minister) Order 2011 of( S.I. No. 138 of 2011 )), hereby
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Immigration Act 2004 (Visas)
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Immigration Act 2004 (Visas) 

(Amendment) Order 2020. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 10 July 2020
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited immigration act 2004 (visas) (amendment) order 2020 (2) order come operation 10 july 2020

title: Department and Title of Minister) Order 2011 of( S.I. No. 138 of 2011 )), hereby
heading: 2. The Immigration Act 2004 (Visas) Order 2014 (S.I. No. 473 of 2014) is
text_raw:
2. The Immigration Act 2004 (Visas) Order 2014 (S.I. No. 473 of 2014) is 
amended, in Article 3(d), by the substitution of "10 July 2020" for "31 October 
2021 " 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

9 July, 2020. 

HELEN McENTEE, 

Minister for Justice and Equality. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 28th July, 2020.
